content: {"name": "Salvation Army Red Bank", "alternate_name": "", "description": "", "email": "", "url": "www.salvationarmynj.org/volunteer", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "180 Newman Springs Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Red Bank", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07701", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.3371066, "longitude": -74.0823778}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 747-1626", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Accepts Walk-ins & Appointments"}]}
